text: naṟceyti kūṟupavarkaḷākavum, accamūṭṭi eccarikkai ceypavarkaḷākavumē nām nam tūtarkaḷai aṉuppi vaittirukkiṟōm. Eṉiṉum, nirākarippavarkaḷō (nam tūtarkaḷ koṇṭu vanta) cattiyattai aḻittuviṭak karuti vīṇāṉa tarkkaṅkaḷ ceyya ārampittu nam vacaṉaṅkaḷaiyum avarkaḷukku accamūṭṭi eccarikkappaṭṭa (taṇṭaṉai varuva)taiyum parikācamāka eṭuttuk koḷkiṟārkaḷ
